Package civitas.celestis.util.string

Class RichString

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.util.string.RichString
All Implemented Interfaces:
Text, Transformable<String>, Serializable
public class RichString extends Object implements Text, Transformable<String>
An immutable rich string with a color and format.
See Also:
  • Text
  • Color8
  • Format
  • Serialized Form

    • toString

      @Nonnull public String toString()
      Serializes this object into a string. Note that this is the representation of this text as a string, not the actual content of this text. To get the raw content of this text, use Text.content().
